languages.text:
{n}Ее дородная напарница отмахивается.{/n} "Чего дрейфишь? Думаешь, Старший накажет? Вот не знаю, мне пушка сильно больше пресса нравится! Наконец-то эти, благородненькие, нас боятся, а не наоборот!"
{n}Она резко разворачивается в вашу сторону, выхватывая оружие.{/n} "Ты еще кто так{mf|ой|ая}?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ее дородная напарница отмахивается.{/n} "Чего дрейфишь? Сказал он пальнуть, так мы пальнули! Их же задело, значит, попали! Все равно... Эй!"
{n}Она резко разворачивается в вашу сторону, выхватывая оружие{/n} "Ты еще кто так{mf|ой|ая}?"

languages.text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ее дородная напарница отмахивается.{/n} "Чего дрейфишь? Думаешь, Старший накажет? Вот не знаю, мне пушка сильно больше пресса нравится! Наконец-то эти, благородненькие, нас боятся, а не наоборот!"
{n}Она резко разворачивается в вашу сторону, выхватывая оружие.{/n} "Ты еще кто так{mf|ой|ая}?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid Senior's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid Senior's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

languages.text:
{n}Ihre beleibte Kameradin winkt verächtlich ab.{/n} "Mach dir mal nicht in die Hose. Hast du etwa Angst, dass der Boss uns bestraft? Mir gefällt die Kanone jedenfalls viel besser als die Druckpresse! Wir haben den Spieß endlich umgedreht, jetzt haben die Adligen Angst vor uns, nicht umgekehrt!"
{n}Sie wirbelt zu dir herum und zückt ihre Waffe.{/n} "Und wer seid Ihr bitteschön?"
languages.original_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ihre beleibte Kameradin winkt verächtlich ab.{/n} "Mach dir mal nicht in die Hose. Hast du etwa Angst, dass Senior uns bestraft? Mir gefällt die Kanone jedenfalls viel besser als die Druckpresse! Wir haben den Spieß endlich umgedreht, jetzt haben die Adligen Angst vor uns, nicht umgekehrt!"
{n}Sie wirbelt zu dir herum und zückt ihre Waffe.{/n} "Und wer seid Ihr bitteschön?

languages.text:
{n}Sa collègue corpulente fait un geste dédaigneux.{/n} « Tu vas te dégonfler ? Tu as peur que le Chef nous punisse ? En ce qui me concerne, je préfère ce canon à la presse à papier ! On a enfin changé la donne face aux nobles, ce sont eux qui ont peur de nous, maintenant ! »
{n}Elle se tourne brusquement vers vous et dégaine son arme.{/n} « Vous êtes qui, vous ? »
languages.original_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Sa collègue corpulente fait un geste dédaigneux.{/n} « Tu vas te dégonfler ? Tu as peur que Senior nous punisse ? En ce qui me concerne, je préfère ce canon à la presse à papier ! On a enfin changé la donne face aux nobles, ce sont eux qui ont peur de nous, maintenant ! »
{n}Elle se tourne brusquement vers vous et dégaine son arme.{/n} « Vous êtes qui, vous ? »

languages.text:
{n}她那位身材魁梧的同伴不屑地挥了挥手。{/n}“你有什么好怕的？怕教长惩罚我们吗？但老实说，比起压纸机，我还是更喜欢枪！我们终于可以教训那些贵族了！他们现在怕我们怕得要死！”
{n}她突然转向你，拔出她的武器。{/n}“你又是什么人？”
languages.original_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}她那位身材魁梧的同伴不屑地挥了挥手。{/n}“你有什么好怕的？怕长者惩罚我们吗？但老实说，比起压纸机，我还是更喜欢枪！我们终于可以教训那些贵族了！他们现在怕我们怕得要死！”
{n}她突然转向你，拔出她的武器。{/n}“你又是什么人？”

languages.text:
{n}彼女のぽっちゃりした同僚は呆れたように手を振る。{/n}「何にビクついてんの？チーフに罰されるのが怖いの？私は紙プレス機よりも、こっちの大砲の方が好きだわ！ついに私たちは貴族どもにギャフンと言わせるチャンスを与えたんだよ。今度は奴らが私たちを恐れる番だわ！」
{n}彼女は鋭くあなたに向き直り、武器を構える。{/n}「で、あんた達は何者？」
languages.original_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}彼女のぽっちゃりした同僚は呆れたように手を振る。{/n}「何にビクついてんの？シニアに罰されるのが怖いの？私は紙プレス機よりも、こっちの大砲の方が好きだわ！ついに私たちは貴族どもにギャフンと言わせるチャンスを与えたんだよ。今度は奴らが私たちを恐れる番だわ！」
{n}彼女は鋭くあなたに向き直り、武器を構える。{/n}「で、あんた達は何者？」

languages.text:
{n}Su corpulenta compañera de trabajo agita la mano desdeñosamente.{/n} «¿Hay nervios? ¿Temes que el jefe nos castigue? No sé, ¡me gusta más el trasto este que la imprenta! ¡Le hemos dado la vuelta a la tortilla y ahora los nobles nos temen!».
{n}Se gira bruscamente hacia ti y saca su arma.{/n} «¿Y tú quién eres?».
languages.original_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Su corpulenta compañera de trabajo agita la mano desdeñosamente.{/n} «¿Hay nervios? ¿Temes que el mayor nos castigue? No sé, ¡me gusta más el trasto este que la imprenta! ¡Le hemos dado la vuelta a la tortilla y ahora los nobles nos temen!».
{n}Se gira bruscamente hacia ti y saca su arma.{/n} «¿Quién eres?».

languages.text: {n}İri yarı iş arkadaşı, umursamaz bir tavırla elini sallıyor.{/n} "Niye ayak yapıyorsun ki? Şef sanki bizi mi cezalandıracak? Bence topla uğraşmak, matbaacılıktan daha iyi! Sonunda soyluların ayağını kaydırdık, artık bizden korkuyorlar!" {n}Hızla sana dönüp silahını çıkarıyor.{/n} "Sen kimsin be?"
languages.original_text:
{n}Her portly workmate waves her hand dismissively.{/n} "What's with the cold feet? Afraid the Chief's gonna punish us? I dunno, I like the gun way better than the paper press! We've turned the tables on the nobles at last — now they're afraid of us!"
{n}She turns toward you sharply and whips out her weapon.{/n} "Now who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İri yarı iş arkadaşı, umursamaz bir tavırla elini sallıyor.{/n} "Niye ayak yapıyorsun ki? Şef sanki bizi mi cezalandıracak? Bence topla uğraşmak, matbaacılıktan daha iyi! Sonunda soyluların ayağını kaydırdık, artık bizden korkuyorlar!" {n}Hızla sana dönüp silahını çıkarıyor.{/n} "Sen kimsin be?"
